page.title: 01SUMMARY.
page.content: Wilden village lies some 3.5 miles N.E. of Bedford town. London is about an hour away by train from Bedford, slightly longer by Motorway. Cambridge and Northampton can be reached within the hour. This is a very flat cultivated area, with huge fields everywhere. Most of Wilden village is contained within the Block, with outskirts of Colmworth and Ravensden. Lacking in many facilities, eg. shops, it is compensated by pleasant, peaceful surroundings. Each village is very different in character, conscious of its own identity, and proud of its own achievements.
